column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////In my opinion
column2: this is the best ramen in Houston
column3: and is very comparable to the ramen I had in Â Japan. I prefer the tonkatsu white
column4: which is a saltier/more chickeny flavored ramen that is easier for a western palate.The Tonkatsu Black is also very good
column5: and has more savory flavors that are stronger.
